Name: Pini
Ingredients: 50 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Use a great pisco and you'll have a wonderfully complex drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Pini contains 143 calories
